mapper.select: /*찜기모니터링내역((Cust18Mapper.getHeatLogHstr) */ select to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24:MI') as rcv_tm --수신일자 , fn_get_spot_name(spot_no) as spot_nm --작업장명 , case when oper_yn = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end as oper_yn from heat_stat_log a where TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms), 'mi')::float / 10 in (0,1,2,3,4,5) and to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = substring('2021-11-26T15:00:00.000Z',1,10) and a.cust_no = #{custNo} order by rcv_tm
